news_detail: Hyderabad. Selaab se dochar Kerala ke awam ki madad mein Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen bhi shaamil hogayi hai. saddar kal hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeeno rukan parliment barrister Asad Aldeen Owaisi nay aik tweet kya jis mein unhon nay kaha ke un ki party nay faisla kya hai ke –apne trust’ Majlis Charitble Trust’ ke zareya Kerala flood relief ke liye 16 lakh rupay ka atiya diya jaye. Yeh raqam kal Chief Minister Kerala ke Relief0 Fund mein jama krwadi jaye gi. Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke is ke alawa hum 10 lakh rupay maliyat ki adwiyaat bhi Kerala rawana karen ge. unhon nay awam se khwahish ki ke woh agay badhen aur Kerala ki madad karen.
null.title: Selaab se mutasirah Kerala ke liye Majlis ki imdaad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister o Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K.Chandrashekar Rao ki janib se deegar riyaston ke sath Telangana mein bhi Assembly intekhabaat karwney Election Commission se darkhwast aur mah September mein hi umeedwaron ki fehrist jari kardainay ke elaan ke baayis na sirf TRS qaiydeen balkay deegar Partiyon ke qayideen ko bhi yeh lagnay laga hai ke riyasat mein qabal az waqt intekhabaat munaqqid ho saktay hain. Telangana riyasat ki tashkeel ke liye Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ke shana ba shana jad-o-jehad karne walay Professor Kodandaram ki zair qayadat nai tanzeem Telangana Jana Samiti (TJS) bhi intekhabi maidan mein qismat aazmai ke liye par tol rahi hai. Professor Kodandaram Sadar ney pehlay hi is azm ka izhaar kya tha ke un ki Party Telangana ki tamam 119 Assembly nashiston par apne umeed waar khada kere gi, aik baar phir apne is azm ka izhaar kya hai. Phir ke din akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue Professor Kodandaram ney kaha ke TJS aayindah intekhabaat 2019 mein tanha 119 nashiston par muqaabla keregi taham unhon ney waqt se qabal intekhabaat ke ineqad ke liye jo wajuhaat batai jarahi hain un se ittafaq nahi kya.
2019.title: TJS 2019 intekhabaat mein tanha muqaabla keregi: Professor Kodandaram

news_detail: Hyderabad. Shaher ki aik muqami adalat ney jumaraat ke din ohdidaro n ko hadaayat di ke Paradise Group se talluq na rakhnay wali un tamam Hotels ke Boards nikaal dein jo Paradise ke naam se hain jis ki taameel mein kal aur aaj Paradise ke naam se chalaye janey wali un Hotels ke signboards nikaal dyie jo Secunderabad mein waqay Paradise Hotel ke malikeen ke group ”Paradise Group” se talluq nahi rakhtay. Adalati ehkaam par un Hotels ke signboards nikaal dyie gaye jinhon ney ghair qanooni taur par apni Hotels ke naam ‘Paradise’ ke naam par khe thae. Paradise group of Hotels ki janib se aik darkhwast dair karte hue ilzaam aayed kya gaya tha ke shaher mein kayi Hotels un ki Hotel ka naam istemaal karte hue chalaye jarahi hain jin mein food courts se le kar Hotels tak shaamil hain. Darkhwast mein kaha gaya tha ke aisi Hotels ki jaanib se un ke brand ka ghalat istemaal kya ja raha hai jis se Paradise Group ka waqar mutasir ho raha hai. Adalati ehkaam par ghair majaz naam istemaal karne wali un Hotels se signboards ko na sirf nikaal diya balkay is naam ke labels aur food items ko bhi zabt karliya. Paradise Group shaher mein Paradise ke naam se Hotels ka aik chain chalata hai, is ki Biryani duniya bhar mein mashhoor hai. Iss Group ney Hotels chalanay ke liye Paradise ke naam ka copy right aur logo ka registration haasil karliya hai jis ke baais dosray Paradise ke naam aur iss se mushabihat rakhnay walay andaaz bhi ikhtiyar nahi kar saktay.
null.title: Paradise naam ka ghair majaz istemaal, Hotels ke signboard hata diye gaye

news_detail: August ko Yaum e Aazaadi ke mauqa par 10:00 bajey din Parcham kushai aur Parade ki munasibat se Golconda ke atraaf traffic ke munasib nazam ko yakeeni banaaney Hyderabad police ne traffic tahdidaat aayed ki hai jis ke mutabiq 15

August ko 7:00 bajey subah se 12:00 din tak Ramdev Guda se Qilah Golconda aaney wali traffic aam gadiyon ki aamad o raft band rahay gi. Ramdev Guda se Qilah Golconda mein dakhla ko Yaum e Aazadi ke mauqa par takreeb parcham kushai ke liye madoo kiye gay afraad ke liye 7:30 bajey subah taa 11:00 bajey din tak istemaal ki jayen gi jo A, B aur C Car Passes ke haamil hon ge. Secunderabad, Banjara Hills, Masab Tank, Mahdi Patnam ki taraf se A, B aur C car passes ke sath aaney walay tamam maduyeen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Reti Bowli aur Nanal Nagar Junction se aagey badain aur baayen moud letay hue Balika Bhavan,Langar Houz Bridge, Tipu Khan Bridge, Ramdev Guda aur Makai Darwaza aur Qilah Golconda Gaate ki taraf badhne daayen janib moud len. Neechay utrney ke baad ‘A Car Pass’ holders ko chahiye ke woh apni gadiyaan Fort Gate ke samnay main road par yani Fatah Darwaza Road par park karen. Jabkay ‘B Car Pass’ ke haamil mehmanon se khwahish ki gayi ke woh apni gadiyaan Golconda Bus Stop par park karen jo Gate se 25 meter ke faasla par hai aur ‘C Car Pass’ ke haamil maduyeen Golconda Bus Stop ke qareeb right turn letay hue Football/Boys Ground par apni gadiyaan park karen. Tamam maduyeen jo D, E aur F Car Pass ke sath atay hain woh Qilah Golconda ko Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi (Banjara Darwaza) ki taraf se barah Sheikhpet Naala aur Toli Chowki ayen chunkay unhen Ramdev Guda aur Makai Darwaza se daakhil honay nahi diya jaye ga. ‘D Car Pass’ ke hamileen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh Priya Darshini School Golconda ke paas utar jayen aur apni gadiyon ko parking ke liye Indira Priya Darshini School ke andar bhaij den. ‘E Car Pass’  ke hamileen se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi agay badh kar Golf Club ki simt baen moud len aur Jammali Darwaza ki taraf dayen janib moud kar aur apni gadiyaan Owaisi/GHMC Play Ground par apni gadiyaan park karen. Jo Qilah Golconda ke Main Gate se sirf 600 meter ke faasla par hai. ‘F Car Pass’ ke sath muqam takreeb aaney wali gadiyaan yani aam logon ki gadiyon walon se khwahish ki gayi ke woh barah Langar Houz flayover ke neechay se aayen aur ‘U’ turn lein aur Fatah Darwaza ki simt jaany daayen janib moud le lein aur Fatah Darwaza ke qareeb HUDA Park par apni gadiyaan park karen. Sheikhpait aur Toli Chowki se aaney walay aam log apni gadiyaan Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi mein park karen. Un do muqamat se takreeb  ke muqam tak pahonchaaney ke liye muft RTC buses par sawaar ho saktay hain. Wapasi mein bhi inhen yeh sahoolat muyassar rahay gi.

Taqreeb ke ekhtetaam par A, B aur C Car Passes ki haamil gadiyaan Makai Darwaza, Ramdev Guda Langar Houz waghera se wapas lautengi. ‘D Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan barah Banjara Darwaza, Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi waghera se wapas lautengi. ‘E Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan barah Bada Bazaar Fatah Darwaza ya Jamali Darwaza, Golf Club, Gunmbadaan e Qutub Shahi waghera aur Langar Houz waghera se bahar nikleen gi. ‘G Car Pass’ ki haamil gadiyaan yani aam log sirf apni parking ki jaghon se hi wapas lautenge. Tamam maduyeen se khwahish ki gayi hai ke aasaan shanakht ke liye woh apne mutaliqa Car Passes gaadiyon ke wind screen ke baayen janib numayan taur par chiaspaan karen. Mazeed bran un se khwahish ki gayi hai ke woh dawat nama par ki gayi sarahat ke mutabiq bar waqat pahonch jayen. Alawa azeen un se yeh khwahish ki gayi ke woh route par, gadiyon se utrney ke muqamat aur gadiyon ki parking ki jaghon par taayinaat Traffic Police amlah ke sath taawun karen. Secunderabad Parade Ground par bhi Yaum e Aazadi ki munasibat se traffic tahdidaat aayed ki gayi hain. Tyoli Junction par traffic ko Broke Bound aur NCC Junction ki simt mod di gayi aur Tyoli se Plaza aaney wali gadiyon par 8:00 bajey subah taa 10:00 bajey din tak tahdidaat aayed rahengi. Golconda ke Main Gate par Boarding ke liye maduyeen ke drivers ku talab karne public address system ki sahulat rahegi.
null.title: Golconda par Yaum e Aazadi taqreeb. Gaadiyon ka rukh aur traffic tahdidaat

news_detail: Hyderabad- Commissioner Police Hyderabad Mr. Anjani Kumar ney kaha hai ke Aazmin e Hajj, Makkah Muazzama mein riyasat Telangana bilkhushoos Hyderabad ki Ganga Jamuni tahazeeb ki barqarari aur yahan rehne walay awam ke khushhali ke liye’ aur khaas taur par nai nasal ki munasib tarbiyat’ rahnumai aur Falah o behbood ke liye khusoosi dua karen. Unhon ney kaha ke Aazmin ko vidaa karna un ki khush naseebi hai’ Aazmin e Hajj khush naseeb hain ke unhen Allah taala ney apne darbaar mein haazri ke liye talab kya hai. Aaj Haj House mein Aazmin e Hajj ke 12 wein qaafila ko jhandi dikha kar vidaa karte hue unhon ney in khayalat ka izhaar kya aur kaha ke aazmin ki madad aur khidmat karne walay bhi khush naseeb hain. Commissioner Police ney Aazmin e Hajj ko mahswara diya ke woh tamam shanakhti dastawizaat hamesha apne sath rakhen. unhon ney kaha ke woh muqamat Muqaddisa mein apne Mulk aur Shaher ke safeer hain is liye wahan discipline aur safai ka khaas khayaal rakhen. Unhon ney Aazmin e Hajj se khwahish ki ke woh Makkah Muazzama mein jitna bhi waqt guzray woh duaon aur ebadaat karte rahen kyunkay dua mein aisi taaqat hai jis se insaan ki zindagi mein aik tabdeeli aati hai. Mr. Anjani Kumar ney kaha ke adai Hajj ke baad insaan mein aik numayaan tabdeeli aati hai lehaza Hajj se wapsi ke baad woh aisa kuch Karen ke hamaray muashra mein aik musbit tabdeeli aeye aur hamari nai nasal mein achi aadaten aur salahiyaten parwaan chadhein. Commissioner ney kaha ke agar aik fard hi kisi ke haq mein dua kardey to badi baat hoti hai aaj yahan itney saaray log hain aur un ki duayen lena un ki khush qismati hai. Sadarnasheen Telangana State Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem MLC ney Aazmin se kaha woh Harmain Sharifain mein Facebook’ Whatsapp waghera ke istemaal se guraiz karen aur selfie lainey par tavajja nah den’ jo waqt mil raha hai usay ibadton ke zareya Allah aur Allah ke rasool ko raazi karne ki koshish karte rahen. Sadarnasheen Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Maseehullah Khan ney kaha ke Aazmin e Hajj Allah ke maheman hain aur un ki khidmat har musalman ka farz aur baayis khush naseebi hai, unhon ney Aazmin se khwahish ki ke woh aik farz ki takmeel ke liye jarahay hain is liye woh apna tamam waqt ibadaat mein sarf karen. Special Officer Prof. S. A. Shukoor ney kaha ke Telangana State Hajj Committee Aazmin e Hajj ki rawaangi ke alawa un ki wapsi aur Saudi Arab mein un ke qiyam ke douran un ki har terha se madad aur rahnumai ke intizamaat karti hai. Maulana hafiz Mohammad Osman Naqshbandi Imam Makkah Masjid ne Hujjaj karaam ko baaz zaroori ahteyati baton se waaqif karwaya aur kaha ke woh tavajja aur inhimak ke sath manasik Hajj ada karen. Hyderabad se ab tak Hujjaj karaam ke jumla 12 qaafilon ke zareye 3, 600 Aazmin, Makkah Mukramah pahonch gaye. Aaj 12 wein qaafila ke zareye 300 Aazmin rawana hue, jin ki flayit ney theek 4:00 bajay udaan bhari. Is mauqa par Director mehakuma Aqliati Bahbood janab Shahnawaz Qasim,  arkaan Hajj Committee janab Mohammad Arif Ahmed,  janab Abu Talah Amjad, janab Imtiyaz Khan, janab Arifuddin ke alawa DCP Central Zone Mr. Vishwa Prasad DCP Traffic Mr. Babo Rau, Additional DCp Mr. Mohammad Taajuddin,  Assistant Secretary Hajj Committee janab Irfan Shareef aur dosray maujood thaiy. Budh 8
August ko do qaafilon ke zareye 600 Aazmin barahJeddah, Makkah Muazzama rawana honge. Pahela qaafila 6:00 bajay shaam aur dosra qaafila 10:00 bajay shab parwaaz kerega.

Aaj ke band ke paish e nazar shehar mein RTC buses bhi band rahin, taham RTC ki janib se Aazmin ki buses ki rawaangi ka khusoosi intizam kya gaya. Hajj Camp, Nampally se Rajiv Gandhi International Airport ke Hajj Terminal tak jo special buses chalaye gayeen. Har do basoon ke sath Police scart rakha gaya aur is terhan Police Scort ki nigrani mein Aazmin ki rawaangi amal mein aayi. Telangana State RTC ki janib se aala ohdedar camp ke aaghaz se hi shaksi taur par buses ki rawaangi ki nigrani kar rahay hain. Un mein Mr. C Vinod Kumar Regional Manager Hyderabad Region, Smt. Sudha Parimala Divisional Manager Charminar, Smt. Samira Afreen Dpot Manager Fallaknuma aur Mr. K V V Reddy Depot Manager Mehdipatnam shaamil hain jo har qaafiley ki rawaangi ke mauqa par Hajj House mein maujood rehtay hain. Janab Sheikh Basha Retd. Divisional Manager APSRTC Hajj Committee ki taraf se buses ke intizamaat ki nigrani karte hain.
12.title: Commissioner Police Hyderabad ney Aazmin e Hajj ke 12 wein qaafila ko vidaa kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Ayodhya mein Babri Masjid ki jagah par Ram Mandir taameer karne ke apne wada ko wafa na karne ka Bharatiya Janata Party par ilzaam aayed karte huwe Antararashriya Hindu Parishad (AHP) ke Sadar Praveen Togadia ney aaj kaha ke Mandir ki taameer ka mutaleba karte huwe 21

October ko Lucknow taa Ayodhya ‘Chalo Ayodhya’ Rally nikaali jaye gi. Yahan akhbaari numayindon se baat cheet karte huwe Praveen Togadia ney kaha ke BJP hukoomat ney Ayodhya mein Ram Mandir ki taameer ke apne wada ko faramosh kardiya hai, is liye AHP ney faisla kiya hai ke hukoomat ki janib se Mandir ki taameer mein takheer ke khilaaf bator ehtejaj 21

October ko ‘Chalo Ayodhya’ Really munazzam ki jaye. Unhon ne kaha ke BJP ney Talaq e salasa par imtena ke liye Parliament mein qanoon paish kiya hai magar Ram Mandir ki taameer ke liye koi iqdaam nahi kiya. Praveen Bhai Togadia jinhon ne Vishwa Hindu Parishad se kinara kashi ikhtiyar karte huwe Anatarashtriya Hindu Parishad ke naam se aik nai tanzeem qaayim ki hai phir se sargaram dikhayi dey rahay hain. Unhon ney kaha ke agar Hukumat is masla par ahadband hai to usay chahiye ke Parliament mein aik qanoon manzoor karte huwe Mandir ki taameer kare. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP ko yeh wazeh karna hoga ke aaya woh Hindon ki taayeed chahti hai ya nahi. Unhon ney kaha ke BJP, Hindon par inhisaar karti hai aur Hindu, BJP par inhisaar nahi karte. Unhon ney yeh bhi ilzaam aayed kiya ke BJP hukoomat ghair qanooni Bangladeshiyon ko Mulk se nikaal bahar karne mein nakaam rahi hai. AHP leader ney kaha ke Telangana Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao kisanon ke liye achha kaam kar rahay hain aur un jaisa kaam Mulk ki kisi riyasat mein nahi ho raha hai taham ilzaam aayed kiya ke Bhagyanagar (Hyderabad) mein Hindu mehfooz nahi hain.
null.title: Praveen Togadia ki Chalo Ayodhya rally

news_detail: Hyderabad. All India Small Scale Industries Minorities Committee ki janib se berozgaar naujawanon aur khawateen ko ‘khud kamao khud khao’ programme ke tehat mukhtasir sarmaya se sanati o karobari unit shuru karne ke talluq se shaoor beydaari aur guidance ke liye itwaar 5

August ko 10:30 bajey se 1:00 bajey din tak Madinah Education center Nampally rubaroo Public Garden mein aik free workshop munaqqid kya ja raha hai. Committee ke sadar janab s Z. Saeed ne kaha ke hukoomat Hind ke sanati tarbiati idaara NIMSMSME / Nisiat Hyderabad ke sabiq Faculty Mr. CHVS Murthy mukhtalif aisi scheme ki jaankaari aur rahnumai faraham karen ge jin ke liye hukoomat Hind ke alawa riyasti hukoomat ki janib se subsidy bhi faraham ki jati hai. Naib Sadar Mr. Samson Prakash ne kaha ke jin afraad ne Facebook aur email mil par apne naam register kurwaye hain woh waqt ki pabandi ke sath shirkat karen. Committee ka maqsad ghareeb’ be sahara aur berozgaar afraad ko maloomat faraham karna aur un ko rozgaar ki taraf raghib karna hai.
null.title: Khud kamao khud khao programme ka aaj free Workshop

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad mein aaj mukhtalif jismani mazoori ke shikaar 7481 afraad mein 7. 82 crores rupay ki ashya taqseem ki gayeen. Telangana Disabled Welfare Society aur Telangana Old Age Welfare Society ki janib se aaj numayesh maidan par aik taqreeb munaqqid ki gayi. Is taqreeb mein mukhtalif nauiyat ke Mazureen jaisay jismani mazureen, andhon, behroon aur zaheni mazureen ko un ki zaroorat ki ashya taqseem ki gayeen. Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mohammad Mahmood Ali, Finance Minister Mr. Etala Rajendar aur Home Minister Mr.  N. Narrsimha Reddy, wazeer afzaish moyshyan aur Mr. Srinivas Yadav wazeer Excise Mr. T. Padma Rao Gaud ney maheman khusoosi ki hesiyat se shirkat ki aur mustahqeen mein yeh ashya taqseem kee. Commissioner for Persons with Disability Mrs. B. Shailaja ney bataya ke pehlay marhala mein jismani mazoor 465 afraad mein 3.48 crores rupay maliyat ki motor bikes, 247 afraad mein trycycles, calpers aur artificial limbs, aur 50 afraad mein 25 laakh rupay maliati Battery operated Wheelchairs, Basarat se mahroom afraad mein 86.80 lakhs rupay maliyat ke laptops (JAWS software ke sath ) ke alawa mp3 palyers, Daisy players, walking sticks aur Braille Books taqseem kiye gaye. Samaat se mahroom 1712 afraad mein 60 lakhs rupay maliyat ke aala e samaat aur 1712 afraad mein 1.96 crores rupay maliyat ke 4G smart phones aur zehni mazureen mein 9.8 lakhs rupay maliyat ke 300 teaching and learning materials aur 54. 86 lakhs rupay maliyat ki wheelchairs taqseem kiye gaye. Is mauqa par Mr. M Jagadeshwar Secretary Women, Child and Disables Welfare bhi maujood they.
7.title: Mazureen mein 7.82 crores rupay maliyat ki imdadi ashya ki taqseem

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad ke muzafaat mein Kongara Kalan mein 2

September ko munaqqid shudni Pragathi Nivedana Public Meeting ke muqam par jari taiyarion ka Chief Minister Telangana wo Sadar Telangana Rashtra Samiti Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao ne aaj mushahida kiya hai. Yaad rahay ke Telangana Rashtra Samiti ki janib se 2

September ko zabardast jalsa aam karne ka faisla kya hai jis mein zayed az  25 lakh logon ki shirkat ki tawaqqa ki jarahi hai. Yeh bhi samjha ja raha hai ke is jalsa e aam se Telangana Rashtra Samiti apne intikhabi muhim ka aaghaz kardey gi. Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao ne party qaideen aur ohdedaron ko hidayat di ke jalsa aam mein shirkat ke liye anay walay logon ko kisi qisam ki koi takleef nahi pahonchni chahiye. Unhon ne Police Commissioner Rachakonda Mr. Mahesh Bhagwat ke hamrah intizamaat ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya. Telangana Rashtra Samiti (TRS) ne Pragathi Nivedana Public Meeting mein 2014 ke aam intikhabaat ke baad Telangana mein qaayim un ki hukoomat ki chaar sala karkardagi ka muzahira paish kere gi aur is ki yeh koshish hai ke is public meeting mein lakhon awam ki shirkat ko yakeeni banatay hue yeh payam diya jaye ke riyasat ke awam, uss ke sath hain. Yeh bhi samjha ja raha hai ke Mr. K. Chandarshekar Rao isi ijlaas mein aayindah aam intikhabaat mein Party ke Lok Sabha aur Assembly ke liye Party ke umeedwaron ka elaan kar dein ge taakay woh abhi se intikhabaat ki taiyarion mein jut jaayen.
null.title: KCR ne ” Pragathi Nivedana” ki taiyarion ka mushahida kya

news_detail: Hyderabad. Kul Hind Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen (AIMIM) aur Owaisi Group of Hospitals ki janib se selaab se mutasirah Kerala ke awam ke liye 25 lakh rupay maliati mukhtalif nauiyat ki adwiyaat aaj Darussalam se gaadiyon ke zareya Kerala rawana ki ja rahi hain. Sadar Majlis Ittehad ul Mslimeen wo Rukn e Parliament Hyderabad Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ki nigrani mein yeh adwiyaat aaj shaam Darussalam se rawana ki ja rahi hain. Yaad rahay ke Majlis Ittehad ul Muslimeen ne ‘Majlis Charitable Trust’ ke zareya 16 lakh rupay ki maali imdaad karne ka bhi faisla kya hai jo Chief Minister Kerala ke Relief Fund mein jama karwai jayen gi. Trucks ke sath Doctors aur tibbi amlah ki bhi aik team rawana ki jarahi hai. is mauqa par Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ke farzand master Sultan Salahuddin Owaisi aur Joint Editor Roznama Etemaad janab Aziz Ahmed ke alawa Owaisi Hospital and Reserch Center aur Princess Esra Hospital ke Doctors aur amlah maujood thae. Adwiyaat ke intikhab aur un ki khareedi mein Qayed Majlis Muqannanah Party wo Managing Dirctor Owaisi Group of Hospitals janab Akbaruddin Owaisi ke alawa mazkoorah dono Hospitals ke Doctors aur amlah ki muawinat rahi hai.
25.title: AIMIM ki 25 lakh rupay ki adwiyaat Kerala rawana

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr.r K. Chandrashekar Rao ney Masjid ke Imams and Mauzzans ko Waqf Board ke tavassut se dyie jany walay remuneration (remuneration) ki raqam ko 1, 500 rupay se badha kar 5,000 rupay mahana kardainay ka elaan kya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke izafi shuda remuneration ki adai 1

September se amal mein aeye gi. Chief Minister ke daftar se jari kardah press release mein bataya gaya ke Mulk bhar mein pehli martaba Telangana riyasat mein Aimma wo Mauzineen ko mahana remuneration ada karne ka silsila shuru kya gaya tha. Pehlay unhen mahana aik hazaar rupay dyie jatay thae jis mein izafah karte hue 1, 500 rupay kardiya gaya tha. Chief Minister ney kaha kay is raqam mein izafah karte hue 1
September se itlaq ke sath 5,000 rupay kardiya gaya hai. Unhon ney kaha ke is faisla se Masajid ke 9,000 Imams aur Mauzzans ko faida puhanche ga.
5000.title: Imams & Mauzzans ka remuneration 5,000 kardiya gaya

news_detail: Hyderabad. yun to aqliaton se mutaliq jitne bhi idaara jaat kaam karte hain un ki karkardagi nihayat hi naaqis aur mayoos kin hoti hai magar aisa lagta hai ke is par qaboo paate hue karkardagi ko muasar bananay ke iqdamaat karne ki bajaye is ko mazeed badter banadiya ja raha hai. karkardagi ko muasar bananay aur islahat laane ke to bohat daaway kiye jatay hain magar amli iqdamaat kuch nahi kiye jatay. aisa lagta hai ke Telangana state Waqf Board ki karkardagi ko behtar bananay ki jitni koshish ki jati hai itna hi is ki karkardagi bgrhti jati hai. haal hi mein Chief Executive Officer Waqf Board janab Shahnawaz Qasim ney Waqf Board ki karkardagi ko behtar bananay bohat se islahat laane ki koshish ki hai aur unhon ney E-filing tareeqa car ko muta-arif krwane ka beda uthaya hai magar ab to Waqf Board ka website hi down hogaya hai. is se qabal sabiq Chief Executive Officer Waqf Board janab asdallh ney Board ke umoor mein shfafit peda karne ke liye CEO ke jari kardah mimoz aur ehkaam ko Waqf Board ki Website  http://waqf.telangana.gov.in/ par paish karna shuru kya tha magar un ke tabadlah ke sath hi yeh silsila band hogaya tha magar ab to yeh haalat hogayi hai ke Waqf Board ki mazkoorah Website down hochuki hai aur yeh kayi dinon se band hai magar Board ney Waqf Board ki Website ke ahya ke liye koi koshish nahi ki gayi. hona to yeh chahiye ke Waqf Board ki Website ko aik jame Website banaya jaye taakay is ke zareya zaroorat mandoon ko darkaar maloomat, Waqf Board ke daftar puhanche baghair hi Website taq rasai haasil karte hue haasil karle satke hain. umeed ke is janib Chairman Waqf Board janab Mohammad Saleem aur CEO janab Shahnawaz Qasim fori tavajja den ge aur website par Board se mutaliq tamam maloomat faraham karen ge.
null.title: Telangana Waqf Board ka website down

news_detail: Hyderabad. wazeer baldi nazam o nasq o shehri trqyat mister ke tea rama rau ney kaha ke Hyderabad ko’ aloodgi se pak shehar’ bananay hukoomat, bijli se chalne wali 500 baseen khareeday gi. yeh gariyaan ibtida mein jee each am si hudood mein roshnaas karwai jayen gi. wazeer ney bataya ke riwayati diesel basoon ko marhala waar flat se htadya jaye ga.’ Mana Nagarma’ aik tabadlah khayaal ka programme mein jis mein wazeer, awam se un ke darina masail ki yaksoi ke liye tabadlah khayaal karte hain. unhon ney kaha ke jee each am si ney kachre ki nikasi ke liye battery se chalne wali gariyon ko istemaal karna pehlay hi se shuru kardiya hai. unhon ney Hyderabad ko aalmi shehar mein tabdeel karne awam ki shiraakat daari ki khwahish ki. wazeer ney haal hi mein Ameer pait mein barsati naalon se safai amlah ki janib se blankets aur carpets ko nikaalte ka hawala dete hue awam se khwahish ki ke woh thos aur maya nakara ashya ki nikasi alahda alahda karen .
500.title: Hyderabad ko aloodgi se pak bananay 500 bijli se chalne wali baseen

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao 2

June ko wizarat aala ke chaar saal ki takmeel karen ge. un ki party ‘Telangana Rashtra Samiti’ Mr. Chandrashekar Rao ke maqbool aam schemes ki asaas par 2019 ke intikhabaat mein dobarah Iqtidaar haasil karne ka iradah rakhti hai. guzashta chaar barson mein hukoomat ney bijli, aab paashi, peenay ka pani aur zaraat ke shobo par ziyada tavajja di gayi thi aur intikhabi baras be rozgaar nojawanon aur farahmi rozgaar par tavajja markooz ki jaye gi. TRS hukoomat, 2014 intikhabaat mein Telangana ke aik laakh nojawanon ko rozgaar ki farahmi ke wada ko wafa karne mukhtalif mehakma jaat mein mukhtalif zumron par taqarruraat ke ailamiye jari kiye jayen ge. Mr. Chandrashekar Rao jo hafta ko Parade Grounds par munaqqid shudni jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge, nojawanon ko mlazmton ki farahmi par kiye gaye kaleedi faislon ka elaan karen ge.

TRS zaraye ka to yahan taq kehna hai ke Chief Minister 50, 000 mlazmton par androon 6 mah taqarrurat ka elaan karen ge. yahi nahi balkay samaaj ke pasmandah aur mahroom tabqaat ki Falah o behbood ke liye bhi mukhtalif akhtraay programon ka elaan karen ge. taham Telangana ke musalmanoon mein aik qisam ki mayoosi payi jati hai ke un ke sath kiye gaye aksar ahem waday wafa nahi kiye gaye hain aur in ke tain Mr. Chandrashekar Rao koi dilchaspi nahi rakhtay. un ahem wadon mein musalmanoon ko 12 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi aur auqaafi jayidadon ki Sayanat khaas kar dargaah hazrat Hussain Shah walii ke tehat waqay auqaafi jayidadon ki wapsi shaamil hai. yahi wajah hai ke soshil media par yeh remarks kiye jarahay hain ke hamein dawat iftaar ya Ramazan gifts nahi chahiye, bas 12 feesad tahaffuzaat ki farahmi ka wada poora kardo. ilawa azeen samaaj ka aik tabqa ka yeh bhi ehsas hai ke aqliton khaas kar musalmanoon ki behbood ke buland bangh daaway karne walay Mr. KCR aqliaton ke liye thos iqdamaat nahi kar rahay hain aur inhen haqeer jantay hue un ko di janey wali imdaad ki rqomat ko qaleel rakhtay hain, jaissa ke kisanon ko fi aekar 4 hazaar rupay ki farahmi avrmslmanon ke liye 500 rupay se bhi kam maliyat ka ramadaan gift. mandaroon ke pujarion aur deegar mulazmeen ko sarkari mulazmeen ke mumasil tankhwahon ki farahmi aur is ke barkhilaf masajid ke Aima o mauzineen ko mahana sirf aik hazaar rupay ki farahmi
25000.title: Telangana Formation Day: Hukumat 25,000 jayidadon ko pur kere gi

news_detail: Hyderabad. Sadarnashin Telangana State Haj Committee janab Mohammad Masihullah Khan ney riyasat ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ko hidaayat di hai ke woh farz shanasi aur lagan o mehnat ke sath khidmaat injaam den aur jin Hujjaj karaam ko un ke supurd kya gaya hai un ki bar waqat madad o rahnumai karte rahen. unhon ney aaj seh pehar Haj House mein riyasat ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ke aik ijlaas se khitaab karte hue kaha ke Khadim ul Hujjaj ko Hajion aur Haj Committee o hukoomat ke darmiyan ahem kari samgha jata hai’ un ki behtareen aur itminan bakhash khidmaat ka aitraaf kya jaye ga aur un ko toseefi sanad aur award se nawaza jaye ga. Woh zimma darion se mun nah morhin aur zaroorat ke waqt Hujjaj karaam ko dastyab rahen’ aazmeen Hajj ki rawaangi se le kar un ki watan wapsi tak un ki behtar se behtar tareeqa par madad o rahnumai karte rahen aur mehnat o justojoo ke sath khidmaat injaam den taakay kisi ko kisi qisam ki shikayat ka moqa nah miley. Agar woh itminan bakhash karkardagi ka muzahira nah karen to un ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye gi. Is ijlaas se khitaab karte hue special officer Telangana State Haj Committee Prof  S. A. Shukur ney Khadim ul Hujjaj ki zimma darion aur faraiz ke ilawa Hujjaj karaam ke masail aur un ko darpaish anay wali mushkilaat se waaqif karwaya aur kaha ke aazmeen hajj ko Khadim ul Hujjaj se kaafi umeeden wabsta hoti hain aur woh Saudi Arbia mein hukoomat aur Haj Committee ke numainday samjhay jatay hain. agar Khadim ul Hujjaj apne faraiz aur zimma darion se ghaflat karen aur waqt par’ khasosan kisi haji ke intqaal yaksi aur nagehani soorat e haal mein dastyab nah rahen to is se kaafi dushwari aur uljan peda hoti hai aur Haj Committee aur hukoomat ki karkardagi par harf aata hai. Haj Committee kaafi paisa kharch karkay Khadim ul Hujjaj ko rawana karti hai. unhon ney kaha tamam Khadim ul Hujjaj ko jacket day ye jayen ge aur woh hamesha usay pehnay rahen. jacket istemaal nah karne walon ke khilaaf karwai ki jaye gi. anho n ney intibah diya ke Hadayat aur usoolon ki khilaaf warzi karne walay Khadim ul Hujjaj ko wapas talabb karliya jaye ga. agar Khadim ul Hujjaj munasib andaaz mein khidmaat injaam nah den to Haj Committee un ke khilaaf karwai karne par majaboor hojaye gi. un ko nah sirf black list kya jaye ga balkay un par jo masarif aed hue hain woh un se wusool karliye jayen ge. professor s ae shkor ney mazeed kaha ke aazmeen hajj jin imaarton mein qiyam karen ge is imarat mein muqeem tamam aazmeen hajj ko un ke phone number day diye jayen ge aur building ke office ke paas un ke naam aur phone number ke astikrz bhi laga day ye jayen. Unhon ney kaha ke aazmeen hajj jab bhi phone karen to un ka jawab diya jaye aur un ki jo bhi madad karna ho woh ki jayen. Counsel General ya mualim ya Hukoomat Saudi arab ki janib se vqtan fawaqtan di jaany wali Hadayat aur notson se bhi aazmeen ko waaqif kerwatay rahen’ is ke ilawa tamam Khadim ul Hujjaj rozana apni karkardagi aur Hujjaj karaam ki naqal o harkat aur un ke qaym ke talluq se reyasti Haj Committee ko waaqif kerwatay rahen. Saudi Arab mein qiyam ke dauran qurbani ke token aur train aur bas ke bres late Hajion tak pahonchayin. Bemari’ haadsa’ raqam ya samaan khojane’ kisi aazim e Hajj ke bhichar jaany aur amwaat ki soorat mein Khadim ul Hujjaj aazmeen ki madad karen. Khadim ul Hujjaj Saudi arab mein qiyam ke douran aik register rakhen jis mein un ki karkardagi ka ka record rakhen aur wapsi ke baad usay Haj Committee mein daakhil karen. Is mauqa par assistant secretary janab Urfan shareef bhi mojood they.
null.title: Khadim ul Hujjaj faraiz se kotahiyon par karwai ka intibah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Madina Education and Welfare Society 6

September barooz jumeraat Lateefuddin Hall, Madina Public School, Himayat Nagar mein 10:30 am ko Madina Degree College and PG College ki Silver Jubilee taqreeb munaqqid kar rahi hai. Secretary Society janaab K.M Arifuddin ney bataya ke jumeraat ki yeh taqreeb saal bhar munaqeed  ki janay wali taqarib ka aaghaz hai. General Secretary Telangana Rashtriya Samiti Dr. K Kesahv Rao mehmaan e khusoosi hon ge, unhi ke hathon 1994 mein Degree College ki imarat ka iftetah amal mein aaya tha. Taqreeb ki sadarat Deputy Chief Minister Mr. Mahmood Ali karen ge. Mudeer roznama Siasat janab Zahid Ali Khan aizazi maheman hon ge.
null.title: Madina College ki Silver Jubilee

news_detail: Hyderabad. Chief Minister Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao (KCR) ne hafte ko riyasat ke tamam bijli idaron ke mulazmeen ke liye 35% Pay Revision ka elaan kya hai. Unhon ne sarkari mulazimeen ke khutoot par bijli ke shouba ke mulazimeen ke liye Jame Health Scheme ka bhi elaan kya. Pragati Bhavan mein bijli ke mukhtalif shoubon se talluq rakhney walay mulazmeen ke aik ijlaas se khitaab karte hue mulazimeen ki khidmaat ki satayish ki ke un ki kaawishon ke baayis nau tashkil shuda riyasat Telangana mein bijli ke bohraan par khabu paney mein paheli kamyabi haasil hui hai. Unhon ne kaha ke qaleel muddat mein hum ne tamaam shoubon ke liye 24 ghantay bijli ki farahmi ko yakeeni banaya hai. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ne kaha ke hum ne Pay Revision Commission se tankhwahon par nazr e saani ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal kiya jis par 22 taa 24 feesad izafah ki tajweez saamne aayi. MR. KCR ne bataya ”mein ne Prabhakar Rao (Sadarnashin o Managing Director Genco & Transco) se poocha ke pichli martaba Pay Revesion kitna kya gaya tha to unhon ne bataya ke 30 feesad, mera khayaal hai ke pichli martaba jitna diya gaya tha is se kam nahi ho sakta. Phir mujh se 32% izafah ki sifarish ki gayi. Mein 35% izafah ka elaan kar raha hon.” Unhon ne kaha ke maujooda Health Scheme jo 3 lakh tak tibbi ikhrajaat bardashat karti hai aur khidmaat ke douran mazeed adayigyon ka imkaan nahi rehta hai is par nazar e saani ki zaroorat hai. Unhon ne kaha ke woh Prabhakar Rao aur deegar ohdedaron se kahe hain ke woh aik azadana Health Scheme waza karen jis mein masarif par kisi qisam ki tahdeed na ho. Yeh scheme aap aur aap ke arkaan e khandan ke liye tamaniat bakhash hogi. Unhon ne yeh bhi kaha ke bijli ke idaron ka intezamia bill collectors ki khidmaat ko baqaida bananay ke masla ka bhi jayeza le ga jo is waqt contract asaas par kaam kar rahay hain. Is mouqe par Chief Minister ki dukhtar wo Rukn Parliament Nizamabad Mrs. K Kavita aur bijli shoubon ke aala ohdedar bhi maujood thae.
35.title: Bijli ke mulazmeen ke liye 35% Pay Revision: KCR

news_detail: Hyderabad. Driver Empowerment Programe ke tahet aaj Minorities Finance Corporation ki janib se drivers mein gadiyon ki taqseem amal mein aayi hai. Is programe ke tahet Uber, Maruti Motors aur State Bank of India ke ishtiraak ke sath 342 istefada kunindgaan mein cars taqseem ki gayeen. Yeh Cars 60% subsidy par di jaati hain. Aaj 15.20 Crores rupay maaliat ki gaadiyan taqseem ki gain. Taqreeb se khitaab karte hue Sadar Majlis wo  Rukn e Parliament Barrister Asaduddin Owaisi ney kaha ke TRS hukoomat ka yeh iqdaam khush aayind hai. Hukoomat ko chahiye ke is khussos mein jo darkhwasten zair iltiwa hain un ki bhi aajilana yaksoi kardein. Kisi bhi hukoomat ki karkardagi ka paimana yeh ho sakta hai ke un ke daur e hukoomat mein aqliaton ke sath insaaf huwa hai ya nahi. Kya un ki jaan o maal ya ibadat gaahon ko khatrah to nahi hai. Aqliaton ke liye jo bhi iqdamaat kiye jatay hain unko kis tarha paish kiya jata hai. Aaya un iqdamaat ko ehsanaat par mahmool kiya jata hai ya phir yeh bawar karwaya jata hai ke aqliaton ko un ka haq diya ja raha hai. Barrister Asad Owaisi ney kaha ke hum ney TRS hukoomat ki taayeed ki hai aur guzashta 4 barson mein yahan koi firqa warana fasaad nahi huwa hai.Telangana hukoomat ney Minorities ke liye Jaria saal 2025 crore kiya hai, kiya yeh hum par ahsaan kar rahay hain ya un ka haq day rahay hain. Dastoor mein article 30 mein kiya gaya hai. Ayein ki tamheed mein hik_h gurbat ke khatima, masawaat, adal aur azaadi ka zikar kiya gaya hai jo tamam hindustaniyo ke liye yaksaa honey chahiye. Telangana ke Minorities ko TRS hukoomat ney haq diya hai aur hamein apna haq mil raha hai aur Musalmanoon ke liye aik baat badi ahem hai ke aaj Telangana mein musalmanoon ki pasmandagi, kamzori ko door karne talim ko farogh de rahi hai. Telangana mein 206 Aqamti Schools mein pachaas hazaar se zayed bachay aur bachiyan taleem parahe hain aur un par fi kas aik lakh rupay salana kharch kiye jarahay hain. Barrister Owaisi ney kaha ke TRS hukoomat mein baironi mumalik aala taleem ke liye 800 tulba ke liye fi kis 20 lakh rupay faraham kiye jarahay hain. Hamare  bachay aala taleem haasil karne ka khawab poora kar rahay hain. Sadar Majlis ney wuzraa aur ohdedaron se khuwahish ki ke woh gadiyon ki farahmi ke liye jo 130 darkhwasten hanoz zair e tasfia hain un ki bhi ajjlana yaksoi kar di jaye. Unhon ney TRS qayideen ko mukhatib karte huwe kaha ke aap ki party ka imtiazi nishaan bhi gaadi hai is liye jitna hosakay ziyada se ziyada gaadiyaan dijiye. Unho ney az-rahe mizah kaha ke aap gadiyaan dijiye hum aap ki gaadi ke engine hain usay agay bedhate rahen ge. Barrister Asad Owaisi ney 50 hazaar rupay ke loans ki farahmi ki scheme ki bhi darkhwasten saal ded saal se zair iltiwa hain un ki bhi aajlana yaksoi karne par zor diya. Aaj 342 gadiyon ki taqseem amal mein aayi. Taqreeb se Mrs Mahmood Ali Deputy Chief Minister, Naini Narsimha Reddy, Bandaru Datatriya  sabiq wazeer aur Syed Akbar Hussain Sadarnasheen Minorities Finance Corporation, A.K .Khan Advisor to CM on Minorities Affaris Minister aur deegar ney bhi khitaab kiya. Is mauqa par Sadarnasheen Telangana Waqf Board Mr. Mohammad Saleem , Sadarnasheen Haj Committee Mr. Mohammad Masiullah Khan ,Sadarsheen SETWIN Mr. Syed Inayat Ali Baqri aur MLC Mr. Farooq Hussain bhi maujood thae.
342.title: Minority Drivers mein 342 Cars ki taqseem

news_detail: Hyderabad. Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority HMDA ney LRS darkhast guzaron ko badi raahat dete huye ibtedayi adayigyon ki adam adai ke baayis ruki huwi LRS darkhaston ki processing ke liye di gayi mohlat mein tausee ki hai. LRS darkhaston ki yaksoi ki aakhri tareekh ko 31
October tak tausee di gayi hai. Qabl azeen HMDA ne LRS darkhaston ki yaksoi ke liye 31

August tak mohlat di thi. Ibtedayi adayigyon mein taakhir ke baayis kayi darkhaston ki yaksoi nahi ho payi is liye Commissioner ney is ziman mein di gayi mohlat mein tausee karne ka faisla kiya hai. HMDA ke ohdedaron ko hidayat di gayi ke woh aisay darkhwast guzaron ko aagah karen jinhon  ney ibtedayi adaigi nahi ki hai aur unhen batayen ke 30
September tak 10,000 rupay bataur e ibtedayi adai ki jaye aur 15

October tak LRS puri processing dey diye jayen. Principal Secretary Baldi nazam o nasq wo shehri taraqhiyat Mr. Aravind Kumar ney bhi ohdedaron ko hidayat di thi ke zair e iltiwa darkhwaston ki yaksoi 30

october tak kar dein. HMDA zariye ke bamawajib  1. 76 lakh se zayed darkhaston ki yaksoi kar di gayi hai aur 61,000 darkhasten mustard ki gayeen jabkay 54 darkhasten dastawizaat ki kami ke baayis zair e tasfia hain. 1,694 darkhaston par karwai jari hai. No Objection Certificate paish na kiye jane par 2,237 darkhasten radd kar di gayeen.
null.title: LRS applications ki processing ki tareekh mein tausee

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana State Waqf Board ney Marriage Certificates ki fees mein 50% izafah kardiya hai. Marriage/Talaq, Qhula ke Certificates  ki fees ko 200 rupay se badha kar 300 rupay kardiya  hai jabkay yahi Certificate Tatkal ke tehat jari karne ki fees ko 300 rupay se badha kar 400 rupay kardi gayi hai. Sadar Nasheen Waqf Board Janaab Mohammad Saleem ney aaj Hajj House Nampally mein waqay Waqf Board ke headquarters mein Quzath Section ka muayina kiya jis ka baad tazaeen e nau aaj iftetah amal mein aaya. Unhon nay bataya ke Passport Office ki tarha yahan bhi Tatkal ke tehat darkhwaston ke adkhal aur ijrayi ke liye alahda counters rakhay gaye hain. Awaam ki sahoolat ke liye na sirf printes ka izafah kiya gaya hai balkay amlah bhi badhaya gaya hai. Unhon ney bataya ke Tatkal scheme ke tehat daakhil ki janey wali darkhwaston par Certificate usi din jari kar diye jayen ge jis se khaas kar azlaa se anay walay logon ko faida hoga. Isi tarha aam zumra ke tahet daakhil ki janey wali darkhwaston par bhi dosray din hi Certificates jari kardey ye jayen ge. Telangana Waqf Board ney tabdeeli mazhab ke Certificates ki ijraayi masdood kar di thi taham ab is ki bhi ijrayi amal mein layi jarahi hai.
50.title: Marriage Certificates ki fees mein 50% izafah

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Assembly ki tahleel karte huwe Telangana Rashtirya Sameti ke sarbarah o Kaarguzar Chief Minister K. Chandrashekhar Rao ney riyasat mein intekhabi mahol ko garma diya hai. Telangana Rashtriya Sameti ney amlan intekhabi muhim ka aaghaz karte huwe aaj zila Sangareddy ke Husnabad mein apna phela intekhabi jalsa munaqqid kiya hai. Deegar siyasi partiyan bhi inteqhabat ke liye apni apni tayario mein lagi huwi hain. Mukhtalif siyasi partiyon ke qaayideen ke Telangana mein programmes ko qatiat di jarahi hai. Sadar Telugu Desham Party o Chief Minister Andhra Pradesh Mr. N Chandra Babu Naidu Telangana mein intekhabaat ka jaiza lainey 8

September ko Hyderabad pahonch rahay hain. Samjha jata hai ke woh Hyderabad mein party ke senior qaayideen se intekhabaat ki mansoobah bandi ke baaray mein tabadlah khayaal karen ge. Isi tarha saddar Bharatiya Janata Party Mr. Amit Shah bhi Telangana ka dora karne walay hain. Bataya jata hai ke woh 15

September ko Mahboob Nagar mein aik badey jalsa aam se khitaab karen ge. Telangana mein BJP ki nashiston mein izafah karne ke liye Mr. Amit Sha aik hafta se zayed Telangana mein qiyam karne ka bhi iradah rakhtay hain taakay woh raast apni nigrani mein intekhabi muhim chala saken. Sabiq Sadar Congress Party Mrs. Sonia Gandhi bhi 16

September ko Hyderabad ka daura kar sakti hain. Mrs. Sonia Gandhi ke alawa Congress ki intekhabi muhim ke liye Party Sadar Mr. Rahul Gandhi ke aik se zayed tours ka programme baneya ja raha hai. Maloom huwa hai ke Congress Party ke ahem qaideen Delhi pahonch chuke hain taakay intekhabaat ke silsila mein Party ka laiha amal tayyar karne markazi qaayideen se guft o shaneed ki jasakay. Telangana mein Congress Party ki intekhabi muhim ki nigrani ke liye Party ke Senior qaayed Mr. Gulam Nabi Azad bhi kuch dinon ke liye Hyderabad mein Camp karen ge.
null.title: Badi siyasi shakhsiyation ki Telangana mein aamad

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtriya Samiti ke sarbarah Mr. K Chandrashekar Rao ney riyasti Assembly ki tahleel ke baad aaj dopehar Pragathi Bhavan mein munaqidah aik Press Conference mein riyasat ke 105 Assembly halqon ke liye party umeedwaaroon ki fehrist jari karte huwe tajassus ko khatam kardiya. 109 Assembly halqon ke minjumla Party ki jari kardah 105 ki fehrist mein sirf 2 Muslim umeedwaar Aamir Shakeel Ahmed (Bhodhan) aur Inayat Ali Baqri (Bahadurpura) hi shaamil hain. TRS ki jari kardah 105 umeedwaron ki fehrist mein masiwaye Hyderabad riyasat bhar mein sirf do naye chehray hain. Maabaqhi tamam maujooda Arkaan Assembly ko hi dobarah azmaane ka faisla kiya gaya hai. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney maujooda Assembly ki miyaad ke khatam honey se qabl hi Assembly tahleel karte huwe aawam ka dobarah khat etemaad haasil karne ka faisla kiya taakay riyasat mein asal Oppostion Party Congress ko intekhabi tayaarion ka ziyada mauqa nah mil sakay. Yaad rahay ke Telangana Assembly ki miyaad May 2019 tak hai magar Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ney Assembly tahleel karte huwe mah November/Decemeber mein hi intekhabaat munaqqid karne ke liye Election Commission ki raah hamwar kar di hai chunkay Decemeber aur January mein Mulk ki chaar riyaston ki Assembly ki miyaad khatam honey jarahi hai. Abhi se Assembly ki tahleel ke baayis Election Commission of India ko un chaar riyaston ke sath Telangana Assembly ke intekhabaat ka elamia jari kar ney mai aasani hojaye gi. Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao ki qabl az waqt Assembly ki tahleel ke iqdam ko kuch log siyasi door andeshi par mahmol kar rahay hain to kuch logon ka yeh maanna hai ke is faisle ke pas parda un ki zaeef ul-eteqaadi karfarma hai.
2.title: TRS umeedwaron ki fehrist, sirf 2 Muslims

news_detail: Chief Minister Telangana Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao ney Wazeer e Kharaja aur Bain ul Aqwami Tawwun United Arab Emirates His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zaid Al Nahyan ke sath Hyderabad mein mulaqaat ke mauqa par Hyderabad mein United Arab Emirates ke Consulate keqiyam ke imkanaat par tabadlah khayaal karen ge. Chief Minister daftar ke zaraye ke mutabiq United Arab Emirates ke Wazeer e Kharaja kal prgti bhon mein 5? : 30 bujey shaam Chief Minister Mr. K Chandarshekar Rao se mulaqaat karen ge. dono qaideen deegar umoor ke ilawa Hyderabad mein amarati Consulate ke qiyam ke imkanaat par tabadlah khayaal karen ge aur Telangana mein sarmaya kaari ke baray mein bhi baat cheet karen ge. Sheikh Abdullah bin Zaid Al Nahyan hndstan ke aik hafta ke dora par 24 June ko Dehli puhanche hain. un ke programme mein Mumbai , ahmdaabad, chinayi aur bingloru ka bhi dora shaamil hain.
null.title: Hyderabad mein Emirates ka Consulate

news_detail: Hyderabad. Telangana Rashtra Samithi ke sarbarah o cheif minister mister ke Chandar shikhr rao ney aaj id-daa kya ke un ki party aindah intikhabaat mein 100 nashiston par kamyabi haasil karte hue Iqtidaar par apna qabza barqarar rakhay gi. Party Headquarters Telangana Bhavan mein sabiq wazeer o congress quied aur un ke kaarkunon ka party mein khermaqdam karne ke baad khitab karte hue mister chndrshikhr rao ney kaha ke aik neye surway ke mutabiq TRS ke liye aindah intikhabaat bohat aassan hon ge aur woh 100 se zayed nashistain haasil kere gi. cheif minister ney kaha ke intikhabaat honey den aur dekhen ke tamam siyasi partiyan hamaray khilaaf muttahid bhi ho jaien to TRS kamyaab hogi. unhon ney kaha’ ‘ tashkeel Telangana aik tareekh hai aur soonahre Telangana ki taamer o no o taraqqi aik aur tareekh hai. haliya surway ke mutabiq TRS hukoomat ki ghareeb aur mahroom tabqaat ke liye falahi schemes aur taraqiyati programon se khush hain. hamari party ko awam ki taied haasil hai aur hum baghair kisi mushkil dobarah Iqtidaar par wapas ayen ge.’ ‘ unhon ney kaha ke kalyaan laxmi scheme ka maqsad zaroorat mand tabqaat ki madad karna hai aur ab usay riyasat mein aala zaat ke ghurba taq wusat di jarahi hai. hum ney Iqtidaar par aney ke baad awam ki mushkilaat, takaleef aur zaroorat ko paish e nazar rakhtay hue schemes waza kiye. TRS hukoomat ney guzashta chaar barson mein rait se 1, 675 crore rupay ki aamdani haasil ki jabkay maazi ki congress hukoomat ney apne das sala daur Iqtidaar mein sirf 39 crore rupay mujtma krpayi thi
100.title: TRS ku 100 nashiston ke sath dobarah Iqtidaar : KCR

news_detail: Japan ke wazeer e azam Shinzō Abe ko Israeli wazeer e azam ke ghar par jootay mein meetha paish karne ki tasaveer ne naya tanaza khara kardiya hai. bain al aqwami media reports ke mutabiq japaani tahazeeb vsqaft mein jootay ko intahi hattak amaiz tasawwur kya jata hai, to kya Israeli wazeer e azam ne Japaani hum mansab se safarti aadaab se hatt kar rawayya brta hai? Bartanwi nashriyati idaara ki report ke mutabiq guzashta hafta japaani wazeer e azam Abe aur un ki ahliya ko Israeli wazeer e azam Benjamin Netanyahu ne apni rahaish gaah par ashayie par madoo kya, jis ke aakhir mein dhaat ke banay jooton mein meetha paish kya gaya, Shinzō Abe ne yeh meetha baghair kisi hichkichahat ke khalya lekin is baat ko Japan ke safeeron ne pasand nahi kya .

Japan ke umoor par nazar rakhnay walay tajzia nigaron aur sfartkaron ne is iqdaam par herat ka izhaar kya aur sath hi usay Israel ka intahi ghair hassas aur ehmaqana feal qarar diya hai kyunkay Japan mein jootay se kam ahmiyat ki koi cheez ka tasawwur bhi mojood nahi, japaani –apne gharon balkay –apne dafatir mein bhi jootay utaar kar daaqil hotay hain. is hawala se mazeed yeh bhi kaha ja raha hai ke japaani wazeer e azam o deegar wuzra  aur arakeen parliman bhi –apne dafatir mein jootay pehan kar nahi jatay, Israeli wazeer e azam ke ashayie mein kya gaya iqdaam bilkul aisa hi hai ke kisi yahodi maheman ko khanzeer ki shakal ke bartan mein khana paish kya jaye. aik japaani sifaratkaar ne Yedioth Ahronoth se baat karte hue kaha’ kisi bhi Saqafat mein jootay ko maiz par nahi rakha jata, is amal ko injaam dainay walay ke zehan o dil mein kya tha? agar yeh mazaq tha to hamein yeh acha nahi laga, hum –apne Wazeer e Azam ke sath honay wali is bud sulooki par naraaz hain .

Israeli wazeer e azam aur japaani hum mansab ke ashayie ki tasaveer aur ghair safarti rawayya samaji raabtey ki Websites par zair behas hai, ab dekhna yeh hai ke duniya bhar ke mumalik ko beeet almuqaddas mein –apne safarti dafatir kholnay par raazi karne mein koshan Israeli wazeer e azam ke is iqdaam ke nataij kya nikaltay hain
1.title: Israel mein Japaani wazeer e azam ke liye jootay mein meetha rakh kar tawaze?

news_detail: Mumbai. Mumbai police se wabsta aik constable ny yeh kehte hue ke woh –apne khandan ki kifalat se aajiz hai chunkay woh do mah se apni thankhowa se mahroom hai,’ uniform mein bheek mangnay’ ki ijazat talabb ki. mehakma ke sarbarah Commisioner of Police Mumbai Mr. Datta Padsalgikar aur Chief   Minister Maharashtra Mr. Devendra Fadnavis ke mosooma maktoob mein constable Dyaneshwar Ahir Rao ny apni bemaar ahliya ki dekh bhaal aur ghar ke akhrajaat ki pabajayee ke liye bheek mangnay ki ijazat talabb ki hai. Local Arms Unit se wabsta Dyaneshwar Ahir Rao ny –apne maktoob mein bataya ke woh 20 taa 22 March rukhsat haasil kya tha, taham un ki ahliya ke paiir mein fracture aagaya is liye woh rukhsat ke ekhtataam par duty par rujoo bah car nah ho saka. Ahir Rao jin ki posting Shiv Sena sarbarah Mr. Udhav Thakre ki rahaish gaah’ ‘ Mathusri ‘ par Security team ke sath hai, id-daa kya ke unhon ny un ki Unit ke incharge ko phone par hungami rukhsat ke baray mein ittila di thi ke woh mazeed paanch dinon taq rukhsat par rahay ga. apni biwi ke ilaaj ke baad woh 28 March ko rujoo bah car hogaya. lekin is ke baad se usay thankhowa nahi mil parhi hai aur nah hi usay kuch bataya ja raha hai. maktoob mein is ny kaha ke usay apni bemaar ahliya ka ilaaj karna hai, zaeef walidain aur beti ki dekh bhaal karna aur haasil kardah karzz par mahana aqsat bhi ada karna hai, chunkay mujhe meri thankhowa aisaal nahi ki jarahi hai is liye woh un akhrajaat ki pabajayee karne se qassar hai. is liye main aap se chahta hon ke mujhe uniform mein bheek mangnay ki ijazat di jaye. Dyaneshwar Ahir Rao tabsarah ke liye dastyab nahi ho saka. Deputy Commisioner of Police, Local Arms Unit Mr. Vasant Jadahv se rabita karne par unhon ny kaha ke yeh maamla shoba nazam o nasq ke tehat hai is liye woh is par tabsarah nahi kar saktay.
2.title: Mujhe uniform mein bheek mangnay diya jaye, do mah se thankhowa se mahroom police constable ki Chief Minister se faryaad

news_detail: Japan mein railway ke nizaam ko duniya ka sab se mayaari aur behtareen nizaam qarar diya jata hai. is ki deegar khoobiyon ke sath waqt muqarara par rail gadiyon ki aamad waraft bhi hai, magar haal hi mein aik rail gaadi –apne waqt muqarara se 25 skind pehlay rawana hui to is par railway company’ jee west’ ko awam se moazrat karna pari hai. hindustaan ka yeh haal hai ke Shatabdi jaisi trainenbhi ghanta bhar takheer se chalne lagey to bhi railway ki taraf se koi moazrat khawahi nahi ki jati. yahi nahi balkay musafireen ko haqeeqi sorat e haal se waaqif karwana bhi munasib nahi samgha jata. akhbar’ daily mil’ ki report ke mutabiq’ jee west’ ki taraf se jari kardah aik bayan mein kaha gaya hai ke company –apne gahkon aur swaryon ko rail gaadi pachees second qabal rawana karne paish anay wali mushkil par moazrat talabb karti hai. rail gaadi ki qabal از waqt rawaangi ki wajah rail gaadi ke ohdedar ki ghalat fehmi batayi ja rahi hai. gaadi ke hakkaam naay samgha ke plate form se gaadi ki rawaangi ka waqt 7 : 11 hai. unhon naay tamam bogyon ke darwazay is waqt band kar diye jab dekha ke plate form par koi bhi musafir train ke qareeb khara dikhayi nahi day raha. jee west company ki rail gaadi ki Hyogo shehar ke Neshi  Akashi Railway station se rawaangi ka waqt 7 : 12 bujey din tha magar gaadi aadha minute se chand second pehlay hi rawana ho gayi. Japan mein rail gadiyon ki aamad waraft ko poori duniya mein namoonay ke tour par paish kya jata hai jahan koi bhi rail gaadi das seconds se ziyada takheer ka shikaar nahi hoti
3.title: Train 25 second muqarara waqt se pehlay rawana karne par Japani company ki moazrat

news_detail: Ahmedabad. Gujarat ke aik sarkari ohdedar ny daawa kya ke woh Kalaki hai, yani Lord Vishnu ka daswaan Avtar aur woh daftar haazir nahi ho sakta chunkay woh aalmi zameer badalny aik’ ‘ Tappssea ‘ ‘ kar raha hai. sardar  Sarovar Punarvast Agency (SSPA) se wabsta Suprintending Engineer Ramesh Chandra Fefar ny wajah numai notice ke jawab mein kaha ke is ki Tappssea ke baais malik mein achi barish horahee hai .

Wazeer e Azam , markazi wazraa, Chief Minister aur Governors jab deomalai kahaaniyon ko science ki taraqqi ki alamat saabit karne ke darpay hoon to aik sarkari mulazim khud ko Kalaki Avtar samajhney lagey to koi herani nahi hooni chahiye. inhen jari kardah wajah numai notice aur is ka jawab soshil media par vayrl hogaya. Fefar ny aaj raaj coat mein apni rahaish gaah par akhbaari numaindon se baat cheet karte hue kaha’ ‘ is ke bawajood agar aap ko yaqeen nah ho, mein dar haqeeqat Lord Vishnu ka daswaan Avtar hoon aur anay walay dinon mein yeh saabit kar dikhaoonga. mein jab March 2010 mein daftar mein tha is waqt jaan paaya ke mein Kalaki Avtar hoon, tab se mere paas muqaddas taqtin hain.’ ‘ agency ki janib se inhen teen din qabal jari kardah wajah numai notice ke jawab mein kaha ke woh daftar nahi aasakta chunkay woh’ Tappssea ‘ karne mein mashgool hai. –apne do safhaat par mushtamil jawab mein Fefar ny kaha ke aalmi zameer ko badalny ke liye woh panchwin’ بْعد’ mein daakhil hotay hue ghar mein Tappssea kar rahay hain. woh aisi Tappssea daftar mein baith kar nahi kar saktay. unhoon ny id-daa kya ke un ki jari Tappssea ke baais hndstan mein guzashta 19 barson se achi barish horahee hai. unhoon ny kaha ke SSPA ko yeh faisla karna chahiye ke agency ke liye un ka daftar mein baithna aur waqt guzari karna ziyada ahem hai ya phir malik ko qeht saali se bachanay koi thos kaam kere. chunkay woh Kalaki Avtar hai is liye malik mein achi barish horahee hai. notice ke mutabiq Mr. Fefar guzishta 8 mahino mein sirf 16 din hi daftar haazir hue
4.title: Mein Kalaki, Lord Vishnu ka daswaan Avtar hoon, daftar haazir nahi ho sakta : Gujarat ka sarkari mulazim

news_detail: Israeli jail mein qaid aik Falasteeni aseer aas tarbooz ki tasweer ko bahar bhejnay mein kamyaab ho gaya jo aas neh 17 baras ke taweel arsay ke baad dekha tha. Israeli jailon mein taweel arsay se qaid aseer abbu Mahmood neh tasweer ke sath munsalik –apne tabsaray mein bataya ke” jail intizamia neh tarbooz par taqreeban 18 baras se aed pabandi ko utha liya. intizamia neh har chay qaidyoun mein aik tarbooz taqseem kya aur hum ab Azaan maghrib ka intzaar kar rahay hain “. Israeli jailon mein 13 baras guzaarne walay aik qaidi ibrahim Samhan neh bataya ke qaabiz hakkaam neh 2000 hamza mein beeet almuqaddas ki antfazh tehreek ke waqt se qaidyoun ke liye tarbooz par pabandi aed kar di thi. inhen andesha tha ke tarbooz ke zariye baaz cheezon ko khufia tor muntaqil kya ja sakta hai. Samhan ke mutabiq aik qaidi ke liye yeh iqdaam aziat rasani aur usay mehroomi ka ehsas dilanay ke mutradif tha. qaabiz hakkaam qaidyoun ke liye baaz saadi si ashya maslan ice kareem, khusbhoo, tasbeeh ke rangeen danay, chamchay aur sheeshay ke glass waghera bhi mamnoo qarar dete hain. maazi mein qaidyoun ki janib se jail mein apni roz maraah ki zindagi behtar bananay ke wastay hrhtalon ka ihtimaam kya jata raha hai. sonay ke liye takiye ka husool qaidi ke liye intahi khush bakhti shumaar ki jati hai. isi terhan yakam ramadaan ko Israeli hakkaam ki janib se jailon mein tarbooz ke dakhlay ki ijazat dena bhi hai
5.title: Israeli jailon mein 18 baras baad Falasteeni qaidyoun ke liye” tarbooz” ki aamad!

news_detail: Bairut : Lebanon ki police ko 52 sala be ghar aur maazoor bhikaran ki laash aik gaadi se mili aur sath hi khatoon ke paas karodon rupay honay ka inkishaaf bhi sun-hwa hai. ghair mulki khabar-rasan idaara ke mutabiq labnani police ko aik kharab gaadi mein laash dikhayi di, police ny –apne qabzay mein lekar tafteesh ka aaghaz kya tou pata chala ke yeh laash 52 sala bhikaran fatima usmaan ki hai jo Lebanon ki sarkon par bheek manga karti thi jab ke khatoon ko dil ka dora para jis ke sabab un ki mout waqay hui. doosri janib labnani police kwasi gaadi se karodon rupay bhi miley, jis mein woh khatoon rahaish Pazeer bhi thi aur iss ke ilawa 52 sala bhikaran ka koi aur thikaana nahi tha, police ku bhikaran ke samaan se 5 million lebanani pound yani ( 3 hazaar 333 dollar ) miley jab ke mazeed tafteesh karne par pata chala ke khatoon ka aik bank account bhi hai .

police ny bhikaran ke account ki maloomat ki tou pata chala ke un ke saving account mein 1. 7 billion labnani pound yani 1. 12 million dollar maujud they jo hindustani currency mein taqreeban 12 crore ki raqam banti hai. baad azan khatoon ki walida aur 7 behan bhaiyon ny khatoon ki laash wusool karkay usay –apne aabadi gaon le gaye.
6.title: Lebanon ki 52 sala crorepati bhikaran

news_detail: Harmain Sharifain ke umoor ki General Presidency ne” Zam Zam : Aabb mubarak” ke naam se aik dastawizi film tayyar ki hai. film mein kunwein se aabb Zam Zam ke niklny aur is ke baad mukhtalif maqamat tak pounchanay ke marahil ko tafseel se paish kya gaya hai. Zam Zam ka kunwan masjid haraam ke andar Mataaf ke sehan mein Bait Allah se 21 meter ke faaslay par zair zameen waqay hai .

Saudi sarkari khabar rasan agency SPA ke mutabiq film mein bataya gaya hai ke Zam Zam ke kunwein se bahar anay walay meethay pani ki ost raftaar kam az kam 11 litre fi second aur ziyada se ziyada 18. 5 litre fi second hai. Zam Zam ke kunwein ki geherai sirf 31 meter hai. kunwein se pani khenchnay ke liye do bhaari pmpon ka sahara liya jata hai jo shfton mein 24 ghantay kaam karte hain. pani ko kheanch kar khud car tareeqay se khusoosi pipe linon ke zariye” king abdullah ban abdalaziz project” bheja jata hai. yeh project Makkah Mukramma ke ilaqay kudi mein waqay hai .

dastawizi film mein dekhaya gaya hai ke aabb Zam Zam ko khusoosi tankers ke zariye Madina Munawwara bheja jata hai. un tankers mein mojood pani is tareeqa se muqffil kya jata hai ke woh masjid nabwi mein mutaliqa ahal car hi khol sakta hai. aam dinon mein rozana ostan 1. 5 laakh litre Zam Zam Madina Munawwara bheja jata hai jab ke Ramadhan aur Haj ke season mein yeh miqdaar rozana 4 laakh litre tak poanch jati hai. Aabb Zam Zam ko jaraseem se pak coolers mein bhar kar Masjid Haraam aur Masjid Nabawi pohanchaya jata hai. is ke baad battery se chalne wali gadiyon ke zariye un coolers ko hrmin mein mutayyan mukhtalif maqamat tak pohanchaya jata hai. coolers ki majmoi tadaad 40 hazaar ke qareeb hai jin mein peenay ke liye thanda aur saada dono halaton mein aabb dastyab hota hai. coolers ke sath plastic ke disposable glass rakhay jatay hain jin ka yomiya istemaal 20 laakh ke qareeb hai .

sarkari adaad o shumaar ke mutabiq masjid haraam mein aabb Zam Zam ka yomiya istemaal 7 lakh litre ke qareeb hai jab ke Ramadhan aur Haj ke season mein yeh miqdaar yomiya 20 lakh litre tak pahonch jati hai. Harmain ke umoor ki Presidency Aabb Zam Zam ke tahaffuz aur usay kisi bhi qisam ke jaraseem aur aloodgi se pak rakhnay ke liye hama waqt koshan rehti hai. is silsila mein 24 ghanton ke douran mukhtalif maqamat se Zam Zam ke pani ke yomiya 100 namoonay le kar un ko is maqsad ke liye banai gayi khusoosi laboratory mein test kya jata hai .

saal 2010 hamza mein King Abdullah bin Abdul Aziz Zam Zam Water Project ka qiyam amal mein aaya. Makkah Mukramma ke ilaqa kudi mein waqay is mansoobah ka maqsad aabb Zam Zam ko sahal tareen tareeqon se logon tak pahunchana hai. is ke ilawa aabb Zam Zam ke tahaffuz aur usay aloodgi waghera se pak rakhna hai. yeh mansoobah aabb Zam Zam ko zakheera karne ke liye markazi khud car where house par mushtamil hai. is ke zariye rozana aabb Zam Zam ke 10 litre walay 15 laakh can takseem kiye jatay hain
7.title: Aabb Zam Zam kaisay awam tak pohanchana hai?

news_detail: France ke dar-al-hakoomat Paris mein haqeeqi Spider Man ney bacha ko bachanay ke liye apni jaan par khail gaya. Africi nazaad Muslim nojawan balcony se bachay ko latakta dekh kar tees second mein chothi manzil taq charh gaya, bacha ki jaan bachanay wala 22 sala Mohammad Gassama Paris ka hero ban gaya. Frnch President Emmanuel Macron ney Mohammad Gassama ku sadarati mehal madoo kya aur France ki shehriat dainay ka elaan kardiya jabkay Paris ke mayor ney Mohammad Gassama ko ” Spider Man” ka khitaab diya hai. Mohammad Gassama behtar mustaqbil ki talaash mein apna mulk Mali chod kar France aaya hai. bacha ko bachanay ke saaray manazair ko wahan mojood kayi shahideen ney –apne –apne cameron aur cellphones mein mehfooz karliya aur se soshil media par post kardiya jis ke baais Mohammad Gassama ko kuch hi der mein shohrat haasil hogayi. francesi khabar rasan zaraye ke mutabiq is ladke ko tanha chore kar is ke waalid shopping mein mehv hogaye they .

Mohammad Gassamaہ ney bataya ke jab is ney dekha ke imarat ke neechay thehray shahideen oopar dekhte hue cheekh o pukaar kar rahay to unhon ney imarat par nazar dorhayi aur chothi manzil par inhen aik bacha latakta sun-hwa nazar aaya. unhon ney kaha ke woh fori is bacha ko bachanay imarat par charhne lagey, Allah ka shukar hai ke unhon ney bacha ko bchalya. saddar France Mr. Micron ney inhen sadaarti mehal ‘Elysee’ madoo karte hue ghair mamooli karnaama injaam dainay par un ki sataish ki. saddar ney inhen medal bhi paish kya. unhon ney saddar ko bataya ke jaisay hi unhon ney bacha ko dekha woh daud parre aur sarrak paar karte hue imarat par charh doray aur bacha ko bchalya. unhon ney saddar ko bataya ke woh bacha ko bachanay ke baare mein aik lamha bhi der nahi kiye. unhon ney kaha lillah ney meri madad ki. Allah ka shukar ke mein ney bacha ko bchalya.’ ‘ Gassamaہ ney saddar ko apni kahani sunai. saddar ney un se kaha ke tum ney bacha ki jaan bachaai, tumhari hosla afzai karni chahiye. Mr. Micron ney kaha’ ‘ chunkay yeh aik istasnai iqdaam hai, hum yaqeenan aaj aap ke tamam kaghzat ko baqaida bnadin ge, aur agar aap chahain to aap ko shehriat dainay ki karwai bhi shuru kar dein ge taakay aap francesi ban kar reh saken.’ ‘
8.title: Paris mein haqeeqi Spider Man bachay ko bachanay jaan par khail gaya

news_detail: America mein aik televangelist ney –apne pirokaron se kaha hai ke woh unhein un ka choutha jet jahaaz kharidne ke liye chandah den kyun ke inhen aisa karne ke liye’ kkhuda vand’ ki janib se hukum diya gaya hai. Jessi Doplantis ney bataya ke unhein kkhuda ney kaha hai ke woh paanch crore 40 laakh dollar maliyat taqreeban 360. 48 crore hindustani rupay maliyat ka falkn seven x jahaaz khareedain. America mein kisi televangelist ka jahaaz rakhna ghayr-maa’mooli nahi hai, lekin is ke liye chnde ki darkhwast ney tanaza khara kar diya hai. twitter par sarfeen ney kaha hai ke unhein is par yaqeen nahi aa raha aur woh bible ki ayaat ka hawala day rahay hain jin mein hiras aur’ jaali payghambaroon’ se khabardaar kya gaya hai. kuch logon ney kaha hai ke yeh raqam ghareebon ki madad ke liye istemaal honi chahiye. apni Website par aik video pegham mein 68 sala Doplantis yun wazahat karte hain :’ aap jantay hain mere paas teen mukhtalif jet jahaaz rahay hain, mein ney unhein istemaal kya hai aur unhein Yasooh maseeh ke liye chalaya hai.’ baaz logon ka khayaal hai ke padrion ke paas tayyaray nahi honay chahiye. mera khayaal hai ke padrion ke paas har mumkin waseela hona chahiye, har mumkina zareya, taakay injeel ko duniya bhar taq pohanchaya ja sakay. unhon ney kaha ke jo jet unhon ney 12 saal qabal khareeda tha woh un ke liye ab mozoon nahi raha kyun ke woh bulaa ruke parwaaz nahi kar sakta aur unhein eendhan ke liye bhaari raqam kharch karna padtee hai. aik tasweer mein woh apne teen jahazoo ke paas kharray nazar atay hain, oopar likha hai :’ yeh malkiat ke baare mein nahi hai, yeh tarjeehat ke baare mein hai.’ Doplantis ney apni darkhwast ki yeh keh kar tojeeh paish ki hai ke eesa maseeh ney kaha tha ke duniya bhar mein jao aur injeel ka pegham har Zee rooh taq pouncha do. kya hum aisa karen ge? meri itni Umar nahi bachi ke mein car ya behri jahaaz ya train ke zariye safar kar sakun, lekin jahaaz par yeh safar mumkin hai.’ 2015 mein Doplantis ki aik video aayi thi jis mein woh aik aur televangelist kinith cop land ke sath kharray hain aur cop land keh rahay hain ke musafiron walay jahaaz par safar karna aisa hi hai Jessiay’ aik lambi tube mein shaitano ke sath safar karna.’ yeh pehla mauqa nahi ke America mein kisi televangelist ney jahaaz kharidne ke liye awam se chandah manga ho. sunah 2015 hamza mein Amrici mubalagh Creflo  Dollar ney –apne pirokaron se kaha tha ke is ke liye 6 crore dollar ki raqam jama karen taakay is se –apne liye’ gulf stream jee 650′ model ka tayyarah khareed saken. rawan saal aik televangelist kahen  Cobland ney apne hamion ke chnde se panchawan gulf stream tayyarah khareed kya tha
10.title: ‘kkhuda ney hukum diya hai ke chnde se naya jet tayyarah khariden’ : Amrici televangelist

news_detail: Huston: Amrici riyasat Texas mein 1 shakhs ko saanp ke katay hue sar neh duss liya jis ke baais woh marnay ke qareeb poanch gaya aur usay bachanay ke liye anti snake dawa ke 26 dose diye gaye jabkay umomi taur par saanp dsne par do taa chaar dose hi dyie jatay hain. mutasarah shakhs ki biwi Jennifer Sutcliffe neh american TV ko bataya ke is ke shohar baagh mein kaam kar rahay they ke achanak unhon neh taqreeban chaar foot taweel aik saanp dekha jisay unhon neh bailcha se kuchal kar khatam kardiya. khatoon neh bataya ke lekin jab un ke shohar neh saanp ki baqyat ko utha kar inhen phenkna chahta to saanp ke katay hue sar neh bhi inhen duss liya aur is neh apna sara zeher jism mein chore diya jis ke baad inhen fori taur par qareebi hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan inhen anti snake dawa di gayi, taqreeban aik haftay baad hi un ki haalat kisi qabil hosaki is douran inhen bachanay ke liye dawa ke 26 dose diye gaye. university of ayrizona viper insti tute ki Dr. Lisle neh saanp ko maartay waqt ya usay kaatnay se mutaliq awam ko khabardaar karte hue kaha hai ke yeh janwaron ke sath aik sifakana amal hai ke usay kaat diya jaye. khayaal rahay ke aik saanp marnay ke kayi ghanton baad taq bhi dsne ki salahiyat rakhta hai.
12.title: Amrici shehri ko saanp ke katay hue sar neh duss liya

news_detail: Bulgaria se sarhad uboor kar ke Serbia ki hudood mein daakhil honay wali haamla gaaye ku murawijja qawaneen ki takmeel ke baghair wapas lout anay par ”ghair qanooni hijrat” ke qanoon ke tehat sazae mout sunadi gayi. Bain al aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq guzashta roz Bulgaria ke sarhadi ilaqa mein waqay aik gaaye ghalti se sarhad uboor kar ke ghair Europi union malik Serbia ki sarhad mein daakhil hogayi thi. sarhad ke paar Serbia ke dehation ney gaaye ko pakad kar dekh bhaal shuru kar di. is douran gaaye ke maalik ney sarhad par patroling karne walay ehalkaron se rabita kya jinhon ney gaaye ko Serbia ke dehation se le kar maalik ke hawalay kardiya aur yun gaaye dobarah Bulgaria pahonch gayi. taham Bulgaria ki intizamia ney gaaye ki aaeni dastawizaat aur qanooni zaroriat poori kiye gaye baghair Serbia ki sarhad uboor kar ke Bulgaria mein dakhlay ka sakht action letay hue ghair qanooni taur par sarhad uboor karne ke jurm mein gaaye ko sazae mout sunaate hue kaha ke qanooni baat yeh hai ke jurm sarzad huva hai lekin kis se huva hai yeh ahem nahi hai. aaeni dastawizaat ke baghair sarhad uboor karna sangeen jurm hai jis ki saza mout hai. gaaye ko is terha sazae mout sunaye janay ke baad social media mein is faislay ko mazhaka khaiz qarar dete hue sarifeen ney shadeed nuqta cheeni ki aur duniya bhar mein yeh trained ban gaya. wazeh rahay ke Serbia Europi union mein shaamil nahi jab ke Bulgaria Europi union mein shaamil malik hai jahan ghair Europi union mumalik se shadeed ikhtilafat ke baais immigration ke sakht qawaneen mojood hain aur sakht jaanch partaal aur thaka dainay wali kaghazi karwai ke baad hi ghair Europi union mumalik ke afraad ko dakhlay ki ijazat millti hai.
9.title: Bulgaria mein sarhad uboor karne wali gaaye ko sazae mout sunadi gayi

news_detail: Masjid e  Nabawi mein anay walay zaireen ki nazron mein Saudi security ahal-kar numaya tareen hesiyat ke haamil nazar atay hain. yeh ahal car Masjid e  ke tamam hisson aur raastoon mein khidmaat injaam dete hue ibadat ke liye pursukoon mahol ko yakeeni bananay mein masroof amal hotay hain. is hawala se aik security afsar ne Al Arabia news channel ko bataya ke tamam bazaar aur dukanain bhi security ahal karon ki khufia aur elania mojoodgi se mustafeed hoti hain. Is douran traffic ki ravani jari rakhnay par bhi khusoosi tavajja di jati hai. Masjid e  Nabawi mein Special Forces ke sarbarah Major General Abdul Rahman Almusham aur un ke saathi Masjid e  Nabawi ka rukh karne walon ki security ko yakeeni bananay ke liye hama waqt sargaram rehtay hain. unhon ne bataya ke” hamara kaam, jagah aur waqt sab mutayyan hai. duniya bhar se mukhtalif rang o nasal aur saqafat ke haamil afraad ki aamad ke bawajood Allah ke fazl se guzashta aik baras se security ahal karon ki tandahi aur chaabak dasti mazeed qabil tehseen ho gayi hai “. Masjid e  Nabawi mein baab salam ke rastay se anay walay zaireen ki aamad o raft ko munnazam rakhnay par khusoosi tavajja di jati hai taa ke roza rasool sale Allah aleh wasallam par salaam ke vaastaa Mawajh shareef anay walon ko kisi qisam ki dhakam pail ka saamna nah ho. is ke ilawa naye intizamaa ke nateeja mein ab Mawajh shareef par anay walon aur pehli saf mein mojood afraad ke darmain jagah ki koi tangi peda nahi hoti hai. major general Abdul Rahman Almehsham ke mutabiq Masjid e  Nabawi mein imam ko rasool Allah sale Allah aleh wasallam ke musalle par wapas laane ke sabab baab salam se Mawajh shareef par duroood o salaam ki gharz se anay walay afraad ke guzarnay mein barri sahoolat peda ho gayi hai. ramadaan mubarak mein Masjid e  Nabawi mein insanon ka aik samandar umadd aata hai. taham is douran bhi raat aur din mukhtalif noiyat ki khidmaat zaireen aur namazion ke jmِ Ghafeer ka istaqbaal karti nazar aati hain.
11.title: Masjid e  Nabawi mein security ahal- karon ki khidmaat

news_detail: Uttar Pradesh Board imtehanaat ke Jaria saal ke aik Topper ka josh o walwala is waqt mayoosi ki nazar hogaya jab Chief Minister Yogi Yogi Adityanath ki janib se usay paish kardah Cheque bounce hogaya, is par sitam zrifi yeh hui ke usay Cheque ke bounce hojane ka harjana bhi ada karna pada. Uttar Pradesh Secondary Education Board ke dasvin jamaat ke imtehanaat mein riyasat bhar mein satwaan rank laane walay Alok Misra ko Lucknow mein tahniati taqreeb ke liye 29 May ku talabb kya gaya tha aur imtehanaat mein 93. 5 feesad nishanaat haasil karne par Chief Minister Uttar Pradesh Yogi Adityanath ki janib se aik laakh rupay ka Cheque paish kya gaya tha. taalib ilm ke waalid ney 5

June ko Bank mein Cheque deposit karwadia jis par inhen bataya gaya ke dastakhaton ke main na khanay ke bayeis Cheque bounce hochuka hai, jis ke liye unhen harjana bhi ada karna pada. Taalib ilm ko paish kardah Cheque par Rajkumar Yadav District Inspector of Schools Barabanki ke dastakhat hain. Young Stream College ke taalib ilm Alok ney kaha ”Chief Minister se Cheque pakar mein bohat khush tha. .. . lekin Cheque jama krwane ke do dinon baad pata chala ke woh bounce hogaya. .. is ki wajah se kuch mayoosi hui”. Rabita karne par yadav ney kaha ke taalib ilm ko aik aur cheque diya gya aur maamla ki yaksoi kar di gayi hai. unhon ney kaha ke kisi dosray taalib ilm se aisi shikayat masool nahi hui hai. district magistrate ade bhano trpathi ney maamla ko sangeen qarar dete hue kaha ke kisi qisam ki kotahi payi janay par karwai ki jaye gi.
13.title: UP Board ke aik Topper ko diya gaya Chief Minister Yogi ka Cheque bounce!

news_detail: Visakapatnam. Andhra Pradesh ke Visakapatnam zila ke qabayeli ilaqon mein mareezon aur zaeef o mazoor hazraat ko bambus par muntakil karne ka sadiiyon purana tareeqa aaj bhi raaij hai. 1 shakhs naay apni haamela biwi ko chand khawateen aur do mardon naay aik jhoola bana kar usay –apne jismon par laad kar ambulance tak muntakil kya. bataya jata hai ke mean road tak hi ambulance poanch payi thi jo is khatoon ke gaon se 6 kilometer ke faasla par hai. dehation naay bataya ke chand saal qabal kachi sarrak barish mein beh gayi thi jis ki durust karne ki koshish nahi ki gayi. Gamila  Lingu ko jummay ko dard zeh shuru sun-hwa chunkay kottapratala mandal ke moza Anuku mein hamal o naqal ke jadeed zaraye mojood nahi hai. agarchay muqami logon naay 108 ambulance ko cal kya tha taham mozoon sarrak rabita nah honay par gaari bar waqat dehaat ko nahi poanch saki. koi dosra rasta nah paker rishta daaron naay khatoon ko ambulance ki jagah tak pohanchaya jahan se is khatoon ko ambulance ke zariye qaribi Mandal Headquarters hospital muntakil kya gaya jahan is naay aik bacha ko janam diya. is waqea ki ittila milnay par muqami rukan assembly anita naay sarrak bichenay ke iqdamaat ka aaghaz kya
14.title: Haamela khatoon ku Ambulance tak pohanchanay 6 kilometer tak jhulay mein le jana pada

news_detail: Aik Nigerian shakhs ney apne baap se izhaar mohabbat mein un ke faut hojane par sirf taboot mein dafan karne ki bajaye inhen 32 million Nigerian currency ki maliyat wali aik nai BMW car mein dafan kya. is shakhs ki shanakht Azubuike ke taur par ki gayi hai. Reports ke mutabiq taboot ki bajaye –apne baap ko nai BMW car mein ltakr usay pehlay se hi khode gay aik barray garhay mein dafan kardiya. yeh tadfeen riyasat Anambara ke aik village Ihiala LGA, MBOSI mein amal mein aayee jahan Azubuike ke waalid sukoonat Pazeer they.
15.title: Nigerian bashindah ney baap ko BMW gaadi mein dafan kya

news_detail: Jakarta. Indonesia mein aik bohat bade azdahay ney aik khatoon ko zindah nigal liya aur is waqea se ilaqa mein khauf o hraas phail gaya. 27 foot taweel azdahay ko pakad kar jab is ka pait chaak kya gaya to is ke pait se khatoon ki luaab mein luthri hui mukammal laash bar aamad hui jis mein un ke kapray bhi numaya they. 54 sala khatoon do bachon ki maa thi aur jis ney brown saari aur surkh bouse pehna huwatha aur is ke kapday bhi qabil e shanakht they. Tiba nami khatoon Indonesia ke ilaqa junoob mashriqi slavisi ki rehaishi theen jo jumaraat ki raat se gayab thi aur agli subah is ke baiton ko aik jagah is ke chappal miley. is ke baad jab logon ney is ki talaash shuru ki to qareeb hi aik azdaha dekha gaya jis ka pait buri terhan phoola huwatha. yeh manzar dekh kar log ronay lagey aur fauri taur par azdahe ko maar kar is ka pait cheera gaya. maida ke andar khatoon ki laash maujood thi aur is ka sar saanp ki dum ki janib tha jis se zahir hota hai ke azdahe ney pehlay khatoon ka sar nigla tha. taham is waqt taq bohat der hochuki thi aur azdahe ke shikam mein khatoon dam toar chuki thi. Indonesia ke is ilaqa mein barray azdahe paye jatay hain jo chhootey Mamels aur janwaron ko zindah nigal letay hain lekin kabhi kabhi woh bachon aur khawateen ko bhi apna niwala banatay hain
16.title: Indonesia mein 27 foot taweel azdaha khatoon ko zindah nigal gaya

news_detail: Bain ul aqwami khabar rasan idaara ke mutabiq Amrici riyasat California mein muammar parking plaza ki chothi manzil se gaadi neechay utaarnay ki koshish ke douran samnay se aati car ko dekh kar ghabra gayeen aur tawazun khokar gaadi ke break par paon rakhnay ke bajaye accelerator daba diya jis se gaadi ki raftaar taiz aur be qaboo ho kar hifazati jangla torti hui Hawa mein muallaq hogayi. Rescue idaray nay lohay ke janglay aur taron mein phas kar aadhi se ziyada Hawamein muallaq gaadi se muammar khatoon ko bahafazat nikaal kar baad azan gaadi ko bhi neechay utaar liya. khatoon ko qareebi hospital muntaqil kya gaya jahan un ka mukammal tibbi muaina kya gaya. doctoron ka kehna hai ke khatoon ki tabiyat behtar hai taham woh is waqt haadsay ke baais zehni dabao ka shikaar hain. rescue idaray ke maahir ehalkaron ki tasaveer social media par vayrl hogyin jis par sarfeen nay ehalkaron ke jazbay ki tareef ki.
17.title: Hawamein muallaq gaadi se muammar khatoon ku bahifazat utaar liya gaya

news_detail: Israeli mahireen Assaar e Qadima ney maqboza Bait al Muqaddas mein khdayi ke douran masjid aqsa al mubarak se mut-tasil slwan qasba se matti se tayyar kardah aik choti nayaab takhti daryaft ki hai jis par Arabi zabaan ke alfaaz darj hain. mahireen ka kehna hai ke yeh mohar nahi hosakti. Taham ghalib imkaan yeh hai ke yeh koi taveez hai jo is dormin tahaffuz ke liye likha gaya. Israel ke aik maahir Assaar e Qadima Hebrew University ke Rothberg International School ke Dr. Nitzan Amitai- Preiss ka kehna hai ke matti se tayyar kardah is tukde ka hajam aik centi meter hai aur is par Arabi zabaan par mushtammil do sutoor wazeh dekhi ja sakti hain. pehli satar mein ” کریم یتکل علی اللہ ” aur doosri satar mein ”اللہ رب العالمین” ( kareem, Allah par hi tawakkal karta hai. Allah Tamam aalam ka Rab hai ) ke alfaaz munaqash hain. mahireen ka kehna hai ke bah zahir yeh kisi tehreer ka hissa ya dastawizaat ki mohar nahi lagta balkay yeh Abbasi daur mein likha gaya koi taveez hai kyunkay is daur mein is khittay mein taveez gunday ka culture aam tha aur yeh qareeban aik hazaar saal purana taveez hai. yeh Givati Parking Lot par aik chhootay se kamrah ki khdayi ke douran plaster flooring ke darmain mohar band mila. muqami akhbarat ke mutabiq mahireen ka kehna hai ke wusooq se nahi kaha ja sakta ke usay danista tor par farsh ke neechay dabaya gaya tha ya phir kareem Nami shakhs ki yeh taveez kho gai thi. Mauhqiqeen ki aaraa ke mutabiq is liye ke is taveez mein sorakh nahi jaisa ke umooman is mein dhaga proker gilaay mein pehna jata hai. hum sirf qiyaas kar saktay hain ke yeh kisi zewar mein jura gaya tha yaphr kisi qisam ke dubba mein mehfooz rakha gaya tha .

Falasteeni maahir assaar Qadima aur wizarat sayahat ke sabiq secretary dr Hamdan Taah ka kehna hai ke yeh aik heran kin daryaft hai. is se hum Abbasi daur hukoomat ke aakhri zamana ki riwayaat aur aqaed ka andaza laga sakte hain. is terhan ke taveez nah sirf abbas daur mein thay balkay aaj hamaray daur mein bhi mojood hain. dr Taah ka kehna tha ke al quds mein Israel ki khudayion ke douran ab taq aisi un ginat ashya aur dastawizaat mili hain magar shyoni hukoomat inhen manzar-e-aam prnhin latayen halaank Israel al quds mein dsyon tareekhi islami maqamat aur arab tahazeeb ke marakaz ki khudayian kar chuki hain jin mein qadeem Yaroshallam mein baab Al-Khaleel, Al-Magariba aur Alsharf kalonyan jaisay ahem aur tareekhi maqamat bhi shaamil hain. unhon ney kaha ke shyoni riyasat al quds mein khudayion ke zareya aik to poooray shehar ka naqsha tabdeel karne ke liye koshan hai aur doosri taraf woh shehar mein yahudion ki qadeem tahazeeb ki talaash aur mazumaa hekal sulemani ki bunyadon ki talaash mein hai taakay is ki aarr mein duniya ke samnay al quds ko yahudion ka shehar saabit kya jasakay. Israeli mehakma assaar Qadima ki al quds mein jari Khudayion mein Israel ki abrani universition ka taawun bhi haasil hai. Bait al Muqaddas mein khilafat abbas ki kayi barri barri tareekhi emiratein theen. aik centi meter ka tareekhi tukda un ke samnay koi hesiyat nahi rakhta. un se bhi qabal al quds mein Umavi mehlaat, girja ghar aur secron tareekhi maqamat shehar ke islami aur arab tashkees ki gawahi dete hain
18.title: Bait al Muqaddas se matti ke dheelay par likha aik hazaar saal purana taveez daryaft

news_detail: Chouti mouti cheezon ki chori mamool ki baat hai magar darjanon tonnes wazni crane jaisi bhaari machine ka aik malik mein chori honey ke baad dosray malik mein poanch jana bulaa shuba na qabil yaqeen waqea lagta hai, magar haqeeqat mein aisa aik waqea hochuka hai. Al Arabia dot net ney is hairan kun waqea ki tafseelaat bayan ki hain. tafseelaat ke mutabiq chand mah qabal Germany mein 48 tonnes wazni crane chori hui jisay malik bhar mein dhoonda gaya magar is ka koi suraagh nah mila. teen mah ke baad pata chala ke woh crane to Misar poanch chuki hai. Germany ke shehar Stuttgart mein gum honey ke baad Misar se milney wali crane ke waqea ney logon ko herat mein daal diya hai. Germany police ney waqea ki tehqiqaat shuru kar di hain magar choron ney aisa kaam krdkhaya ke sikoriti idaron custom hakkaam ko kaanon kaan khabar tak nah hui ke aik dio hekal machine chori honey ke baad aik se dosray malik pouncha di gayi. yeh guzashta 19 March ka waqea hai jab Germany ke shehar Stuttgart mein 48 tonnes wazan crane achanak gayab hogayi. is ke maalik ney police ke paas crane chori ki shikayat darj karai aur crane ka number aur is ki deegar tamam tafseelaat police ko muhayya kar dein. police ney tamam mutaliqa idaron ki madad se gum honey wali crane ka suraagh laganey ki poori koshish ki magar koi pata nah chala. police ney choron ka pata chalaney ke liye mujrim ki nishandahi par paanch hazaar Euro inaam ka bhi elaan kya. crane ke maalik ka kehna hai ke crane ki qeemat 2 laakh Euro hai. aur usay aakhri baar Germany ke ilaqa a38 mein Arfort ki taraf le jatay dekha gaya. 20 March ko Germany ke akhbarat mein bhi crane chori ki khabrain shaya huien. behri aur buri bandar gahon ko bhi crane ki gumshudgi ke baarey mein ba khabar kya gaya. yahan tak ke teen mah ke baad crane ke baarey mein pata chala ke woh Misar ke shehar iskandriya pouncha di gayi hai aur is waqt iskandriya ke custom hakkaam ke paas hai. Germany ke akhbarat mein crane ki gumshudgi se ziyada is ki bar aamad ko heran kin qarar diya ja raha hai. log yeh sochney par majboor aur heran hain ke jahan aik soi bhi beron malik baghair chhaan bain ke nahi ja sakti wahan 48 tonnes wazni crane bhala kaisay chali gayi. crane chor usay samandar hi ke rastay mukhtalif mumalik se guzar kar Misar le gaya.
19.title: Germany mein gayab honey wali 48 tonnes wazni crane Misar se baraamad
